fullplot: A mid-western farm boy reluctantly becomes a member of the undead when a girl he meets turns out to be part of a band of southern vampires who roam the highways in stolen cars. Part of his initiation includes a bloody assault on a hick bar.
plot: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is turned by a beautiful drifter.
title: Near Dark

tomatoes.consensus: Near Dark is at once a creepy vampire film, a thrilling western, and a poignant family tale, with humor and scares in abundance.
